p: Aerial fragments of wild M. spicata L. (Lamiaceae) at full flowering phase were collected in May 2017, from the Laghouat region (Algeria). The samples were identified at the Department of Agronomy, Faculty of Science, University of Laghouat (Algeria), and the voucher specimens (LGP Ms1–3/05/17) were deposited at the laboratory of Process Engineering, University of Laghouat. The dried plant material was stored in the laboratory at room temperature (25 °C), protected from light, until extraction.
